description: S.N.Gunathilake Vs. Mahindra Ratwatte - Hon. K.T. Chitrasiri, J before  1.No Writ of Mandamus would lie unless a public duty is cast upon the person who exercises executive powers. 2.Delay in coming to Court when moving for a prerogative Writ
parties: S.N.Gunathilake Vs. Mahindra Ratwatte - Hon. K.T. Chitrasiri, J
judgement_by: 1.No Writ of Mandamus would lie unless a public duty is cast upon the person who exercises executive powers. 2.Delay in coming to Court when moving for a prerogative Writ
